content.query:
SELECT 
1,
CONVERT(VARCHAR(32), HashBytes('MD5', CONCAT(FirstName,LastName,PhoneNumber)
), 2) AS CustomerSK,
TRIM(CSC.CustomerID),
TRIM(LastName),
TRIM(FirstName),
TRIM(AddressLine1),
TRIM(AddressLine2),
TRIM(City),
TRIM(State),
TRIM(ZipCode),
TRIM(PhoneNumber),
CAST(TRIM(CSC.CreatedDate) AS DATE)  CreatedDate,
--dbo.InlineMax(Convert(datetime,CSC.UpdatedDate),Convert(datetime,CSA.UpdatedDate))  UpdatedDate,
1

FROM dbo.CloudStreaming_Customers CSC 
LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.CloudStreaming_Address CSA 
ON CSC.CustomerID=CSA.CustomerID
